title: Attachment
label: When Scrolling Page...
help: Whether image moves or not with page scroll. Default is 'Scroll'

title: Blend
label: Mix Color and Image
help: If a color and an image are both selected, you can add a filter to blend them.

title: Ornaments
imagehelp: You can add an ornament to the background.
positionhelp: Choose where the ornament appears, always at the bottom of the container.

title: Overlay Color
label: Select a color
help: An overlay is laid on top of the background rather than being mixed with it, but will
still be affected by the blend mode. The result can be use to decrease contrast or provide a
gradient to fade the image in one direction.
